Salad Bowl or Salad Container with Clear Lids This salad bowl is made of thick kraft paper with a coating to prevent contents from leaking. This construction ensures superior durability for quality, single-service use. Available Sizes are 18oz, 26oz and 35oz White Kraft Salad Bowl with Clear Lids It's conveniently disposable, reducing time spent cleaning up and eliminating the need to wash for reuse. Plus, the friendly user design shows you care about the environment, boosting your eco-conscious image. You'll get the look your clients want with the convenience you need. Replacement - Food Containers The Kraft material is an user-friendly alternative to plastic bowls. We recommend lids to fit this bowl, please find them in our Related Products section. They are able to hold oily foods as well as foods with sauces such as gravy without the container leaking. Round cardboard containers easily hold hot, cold, wet, or dry foods. Most importantly, they will keep food fresh for your customers. Usage - Both Containers Use it for salad service at your restaurant, cafe, or cafeteria, or for serving poke bowls at your trendy bistro. When used with a compatible lid (sold separately), it's great for grab-and-go applications, too!
